description: This file defines a client-side layout component for a Next.js application, including a sidebar, navigation bar, and main content area, utilizing React hooks and components.

classes.name: SideBar
classes.description: A sidebar component that contains navigation links and toggle button.

classes.name: NavBar
classes.description: A navigation bar component with toggle and branding, including search and action buttons.

classes.name: ClientLayout
classes.description: Main layout component integrating Sidebar, NavBar, and content area, managing sidebar state.

methods.name: SideBar
methods.description: React functional component rendering a sidebar with navigation links.

methods.name: NavBar
methods.description: React functional component rendering top navigation with branding and controls.

methods.name: ClientLayout
methods.description: Default exported React component that composes layout with sidebar, navbar, and children.
